title: Gentlefolk Queen
description:
During the day, she is a beautiful eye-catching idol celebrity, yet she just ran into the lecherous CEO. At the first sign of disagreement. he begins to harass her. "Baby, don't run away."

At night, she discards the celebrity halo, and reverts to an ordinary girl. She thought no one would be able to figure out her double life, yet the lecherous CEO turns out to be her fiance's uncle? OMG! What kind of situation is this? "Uncle, you can't do this...."
